data.title: Laurieann Gibson Moves from Choreographer to Singer
data.meta_description: VMA-winning choreographer Laurieann Gibson is well known for appearances on Making the Band and her own show, The Dance Scene. She jumped started her career after being selected as a Fly Girl for sketch comedy television series In Living Color and has worked as a professional dancer and creative director ever since.
data.meta_site_name: Singersroom.com - R&B Music, R&B Videos, R&B News
data.text:
VMA-winning choreographer Laurieann Gibson is well known for appearances on MTV’s Making the Band and her own show, The Dance Scene. She jumped started her career after being selected as a Fly Girl for sketch comedy television series, In Living Color, and has worked as a professional dancer and creative director ever since.

With years of experience working with successful artists including Lady Gaga, Keri Hilson, Nicki Minja amongst others, the Canadian choreographer attempts to climb the charts with her first foray at becoming a musical artist.

Her first record, “Last Chance,” is produced Tronixx and written by Infared Ink. Gibson described her debut single as, “This is the last chance to dance for our lives.”

Thoughts?

Laurieann Gibson is a choreographer, dancer and director who has been making waves in the entertainment industry for years. From her work on shows like So You Think You Can Dance to directing music videos for artists such as Lady Gaga and Nicki Minaj, she’s well-known among fans of pop culture. Now, Laurieann is taking her talents from behind the camera to center stage in an exciting new venture: singing!

This ambitious move marks yet another milestone for this talented artist. With her powerful voice and incomparable dance moves, it’s no wonder why audiences can’t seem to get enough of Laurieann. But what inspired this daring career switch? Could we be seeing more of Laurieann than ever before?

The answers may come as a surprise to some – but one thing is certain; whatever direction Laurieann chooses next will surely captivate us all! Read on to find out how she made the transition from choreographer to singer and see where else this journey takes her.

Background Of Laurieann Gibson

Laurieann Gibson is an internationally acclaimed choreographer and creative director who has been in the entertainment industry for over two decades. She started her career as a dancer, quickly rising to prominence due to her hard work and amazing talent. Over time she developed into one of the most sought-after choreographers in the business.

In recent years, Laurieann has expanded her portfolio by taking on acting roles and releasing music. Her single “Living My Best Life” was released earlier this year, showcasing her singing—a new area for her to explore. This move from being just a choreographer to also being a singer marks an important transition for Laurieann’s career.

The success of this release proves that she can be successful in both areas, demonstrating how versatile and multi-talented she is. By pursuing all these avenues, Laurieann continues to prove why she remains at the top of her field after so many years.

Career Transition From Choreographer To Singer

Laurieann Gibson has made a successful career transition from choreographer to singer. Although her primary focus had been on dance and creative directing, she recently released her single ‘Living My Best Life’, demonstrating that her talents extend far beyond the realm of choreography. This move marks an important shift in Laurieann’s professional life as she expands into new areas.

The success of this song speaks volumes about Laurieann’s ability to adapt and take on different roles with ease. She displays incredible skill—not only is she able to come up with captivating dance moves but also create catchy melodies for singing. Her experience in both industries allows her to bring something unique to each project and deliver groundbreaking results every time.

The release of ‘Living My Best Life’ proves that Laurieann Gibson is just as multi-talented as ever before, making it clear why she remains one of the most sought after professionals in the entertainment industry today. With such versatility, there are no limits when it comes to what sorts of projects she can tackle next – the future looks bright for this dynamic artist!

Conclusion

In conclusion, Laurieann Gibson has proven to be an incredibly talented artist. She began her career as a choreographer and soon transitioned into a singer. Through hard work and dedication, she was able to make the difficult transition between two seemingly disparate fields of artistry.

Her journey is inspiring for anyone looking to take a chance on something new in life. It’s never easy making a change like this but with enough determination and courage it can certainly be done. Even when faced with obstacles, if you persevere your dreams will eventually become reality.

Laurieann Gibson is living proof that anything is possible if you put your mind to it. Her impressive story of success serves as motivation for those who are considering taking risks in their own lives. With faith, confidence, and effort we can all achieve our goals no matter how daunting they may seem at first glance!
